title: SSH Setup for ASC and Unity (Full Guide)
text:
Overview
Many OSU systems require connecting through a jump host. This guide includes SSH keys, ProxyJump, and troubleshooting.


1. Generate SSH Keys
ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "yourname@osu.edu" -f ~/.ssh/buckai_key


2. Install Public Key
ssh-copy-id -i ~/.ssh/buckai_key.pub yourname.##@jump.asc.ohio-state.edu -p 2200
ssh-copy-id -i ~/.ssh/buckai_key.pub yourname.##@unity.asc.ohio-state.edu


3. SSH Config
Host ascjumphost
    HostName jump.asc.ohio-state.edu
    User yourname.##
    Port 2200

Host unity
    HostName unity.asc.ohio-state.edu
    User yourname.##
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/buckai_key
    ProxyJump ascjumphost


4. Optional Node Shortcuts
Host u126
    HostName u126.asc.ohio-state.edu
    ProxyJump unity


Troubleshooting
